dashboard.label: People
dashboard.description: Macros examples of people in trellis layout

search.query: | makeresults count=3 | streamstats count | eval name = CASE (count==1, "Baby", count==2, "Man", count==3, "Woman" ) | stats sum(count) as count by name | eval baby_color = "#000000", man_color="#000000", woman_color="#000000" | `svg_viz_aiga_nursery(baby_color)` | eval svg_viz_baby = svg_viz | `svg_viz_aiga_toilet_men(man_color)` | eval svg_viz_man = svg_viz | `svg_viz_aiga_toilet_women(woman_color)` | eval svg_viz_woman = svg_viz | eval svg_viz = CASE (count==1, svg_viz_baby, count==2, svg_viz_man, count==3, svg_viz_woman ) | fields - svg_viz_baby, svg_viz_man, svg_viz_woman
